highlights: Delivered scalable backend services using .NET Core with JWT authentication, RBAC, middleware, and structured logging to ensure 90% uptime and production stability.
Optimized EF Core and LINQ queries improving API response times by 30% and boosting throughput on critical modules.
Developed high-performance Angular front-end applications using RxJS, lazy loading, and real-time dashboards to enhance UX and operational efficiency.
Led scalable solution development using Angular and ASP.NET Core following Agile practices.
Integrated Azure Service Bus, Data Factory, and Blob Storage with .NET 5 enabling message-driven communication and secure data ingestion.
Implemented SonarQube-driven automated code analysis, CI/CD validations, and technical debt monitoring to maintain high code quality.
Optimized SQL queries and database schema using indexing and execution plan analysis achieving major performance improvements.
Applied Clean Architecture and SOLID principles using Repository and Dependency Injection patterns for scalable enterprise systems.
Developed full-stack modules using .NET Core and Angular including reusable components and RESTful APIs.
Implemented database performance enhancements using stored procedures, Dapper, EF Core, indexing, and query tuning to reduce latency.
